body:
I made a thread on one server, so I may as well make one here too. So Hi, I'm late for the party, but that's okay. x3

99% of you know me because I'm a moderator here/Was a moderator back in the day. The rest of you may know me from another network, from my forum activity, ingame, etc. I don't know, but that's fine!

Most of you call me TNTDude, or TNT. I mean, those names are in my IGN, so that's perfectly fine. You may also call me TNTGurl/Girl/Dudette/etc., or by my IRL name, Maddy. I tend to not respond right away if people call me Maddy (ingame), because I'm used to being called TNT. Bear with me o3o

Favourite games are Minecraft, osu!, Rift, Sims 3+4, and more. I spend most of my free time playing those games. I spend most of my time playing Minecraft.

I didn't want to copy and paste the other thread, but oh well, I did. x) If you have questions, that's what this thread is for. I'll answer all questions, unless they start getting.. bad. Have fun. ;p

EDIT: Didn't I make a thread 2 months ago? Welp, time to go archive that one.
